property.name: description
property.value: Temp folder to write stuff to. Should only be set per node in application property file

property.name: description
property.value: Folder to look for Stroom Proxy Content to aggregate

property.name: description
property.value: Number of threads used in aggregation

property.name: description
property.value: This stops the aggregation after a certain size / nested streams

property.name: description
property.value: The limit of files to inspect before aggregation begins (should be bigger than maxAggregation)

property.name: description
property.value: This stops the aggregation after a certain size / nested streams

property.name: description
property.value: Set to determine how many volume locations will be used to store a single stream

property.name: description
property.value: Should the stream store always attempt to write to local volumes before writing to remote ones?

property.name: description
property.value: How should volumes be selected for use? Possible volume selectors include ('MostFreePercent', 'MostFree', 'Random', 'RoundRobinIgnoreLeastFreePercent', 'RoundRobinIgnoreLeastFree', 'RoundRobin', 'WeightedFreePercentRandom', 'WeightedFreeRandom') default is 'RoundRobin'

property.name: description
property.value: The age of streams that we store meta data in the database for

property.name: description
property.value: How many stream attributes we want to try and delete in a single batch

property.name: description
property.value: How long a stream is left logically deleted before it is deleted from the database

property.name: description
property.value: How many streams we want to try and delete in a single batch

property.name: description
property.value: Set child jobs to be created by the file system clean sub task

property.name: description
property.value: Write a delete out in the root of the volume rather than physically deleting the files

property.name: description
property.value: Duration until a file is deemed old

property.name: description
property.value: Should the master node fill the task queue ready for workers to fetch tasks?

property.name: description
property.value: Should the master node create new tasks for stream processor filters?

property.name: description
property.value: Should the master node assign tasks to workers when tasks are requested?

property.name: description
property.value: How long to keep tasks on the database for before deleting them (if they are complete)

property.name: description
property.value: How many streams tasks we want to try and delete in a single batch

property.name: description
property.value: Maximum number of tasks to cache ready for processing per processor filter

property.name: description
property.value: Set the number of streams to be created during a benchmark test

property.name: description
property.value: Set the number of records to be created for each stream during a benchmark test

property.name: description
property.value: Set the number of threads to use concurrently to write test streams

property.name: description
property.value: If set the default buffer size to use

property.name: description
property.value: Should only be set per node in application property file

property.name: description
property.value: Should only be set per node in application property file

property.name: description
property.value: Set this to false for development and testing purposes otherwise the Stroom will try and process files automatically outside of test cases.

property.name: description
property.value: How frequently should the lifecycle service attempt execution.

property.name: description
property.value: Provide a warning message to users about an outage or other significant event.

property.name: description
property.value: Prevent new logins to the system. This is useful if the system is scheduled to have an outage.

property.name: description
property.value: Choose whether Stroom should allow UI access using certificates

property.name: description
property.value: The location of the login app

property.name: description
property.value: The regular expression to use to extract user names from a certificate DN

property.name: description
property.value: The regex pattern for user names

property.name: description
property.value: Number of days before we disable an account

property.name: description
property.value: Number of days before we disable an unused account

property.name: description
property.value: Number of days before passwords expire

property.name: description
property.value: The amount of RAM Lucene can use to buffer when indexing in Mb

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of query history items that will be retained

property.name: description
property.value: The number of days query history items will be retained for

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number documents that will have stored data retrieved from the index shard and queued prior to further processing

property.name: description
property.value: The number of open Lucene index shards to cache on each node

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of doc ids that will be queued ready for stored data to be retrieved from the index shard

property.name: description
property.value: The absolute maximum number of threads per node, used to search Lucene index shards across all searches

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of threads per search, per node, used to search Lucene index shards

property.name: description
property.value: The absolute maximum number of threads per node, used to extract search results from streams using a pipeline

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of threads per search, per node, used to extract search results from streams using a pipeline

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of clauses that a boolean search can contain.

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of search results to keep in memory at each level.

property.name: description
property.value: The default maximum number of search results to return to the dashboard, unless the user requests lower values

property.name: description
property.value: The default number of minutes that search processing will be limited by.

property.name: description
property.value: The default number of records that search processing will be limited by.

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of elements that the XSLT filter will expect to receive before it errors. This protects Stroom from ruinning out of memory in cases where an appropriate XML splitter has not been used in a pipeline.

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number active destinations that Stroom will allow rolling appenders to be writing to at any one time.

property.name: description
property.value: Set by property file to enable auto schema creation

property.name: description
property.value: Should only be set per node in application property file

property.value: Should only be set per node in application property file

property.value: Should only be set per node in application property file

property.name: description
property.value: Node Pool Size

property.name: description
property.value: The regex pattern for entity names

property.value: The regex pattern for feed names

property.name: description
property.value: The page title for Stroom shown in the browser tab

property.name: value
property.value:
About Stroom

Stroom is designed to receive data from multiple systems.

property.name: value
property.value:
About Stroom

Stroom is designed to receive data from multiple systems.

property.name: value
property.value:
About Stroom

Stroom is designed to receive data from multiple systems.

property.name: description
property.value: Do local calls when calling our own local services (true is an optimisation)

property.name: description
property.value: Time in ms (but can be specified as 10s, 1m) before throwing read timeout

property.name: description
property.value: If cluster calls are using SSL then choose if we want to ignore host name verification

property.name: description
property.value: Time in ms (but can be specified as 10s, 1m) before giving up on cluster results

property.name: description
property.value: Determines if the system will allow configuration to be exported via the export servlet

property.name: description
property.value: Email service host name, e.g. smtp.gmail.com

property.name: description
property.value: Email service port, e.g. 587

property.name: description
property.value: Email service protocol, e.g. smtp

property.name: description
property.value: Email service username, e.g. XXXXX@gmail.com

property.name: description
property.value: Email service password

property.name: description
property.value: Additional mail properties can be defined in a file at the specified path, e.g. ~/.stroom/mail.properties

property.name: description
property.value: User Domain (to append to user names)

property.name: value
property.value: UNKNOWN CLASSIFICATION

property.name: description
property.value: A comma separated list of KV pairs to provide colours for labels.

property.name: description
property.value: The URL of hosted help files.

property.name: description
property.value: Number of SQL_STAT_VAL_SRC records to merge into SQL_STAT_VAL in one batch

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum number of records that can be returned from the statistics DB in a single query prior to aggregation

property.name: description
property.value: The maximum age of statistics to process, i.e. any statistics with an statistic event time older than the current time minus maxProcessingAge will be silently dropped. Leave blank to process all data.

property.name: description
property.value: If true any content packs found in ${CATALINA_BASE}/contentPackImport/ will be imported into Stroom. Only intended for use on new Stroom instances to reduce the risk of overwriting existing entities

property.name: description
property.value: If no existing volumes are present a default volume will be created on application start. The volume will live in the volumes sub directory of the Stroom installation directory

property.name: description
property.value: Name of the index service

property.value: Version of the index service

property.value: The entity type for the index service

property.value: Name of the authentication service

property.value: The version of the stroom-stats service

property.name: description
property.value: The kafka topic to send Count type stroom-stats statistic events to

property.name: description
property.value: The kafka topic to send Value type stroom-stats statistic events to

property.name: description
property.value: The name of the built-in sql statistics service

property.name: description
property.value: The version of the built-in sql statistics service

property.value: The entity type for the sql statistics service

property.name: description
property.value: The list of kafka brokers to initially connect to to obtain the full set of kafka brokers, in the form `host1:port,host2:port,etc'

property.name: description
property.value: Set this to true to use Zookeeper for service discovery. Set this to false to use resolve all services locally, i.e. 127.0.0.1

property.name: description
property.value: The base path to connect to local services on, when not using service discovery

property.name: description
property.value: The Zookeeper quorum connection string, required for service discovery, in the form 'host1:port1,host2:port2,host3:port3'. The root znode to use in Zookeeper is defined in the property stroom.serviceDiscovery.zookeeperBasePath

property.name: description
property.value: The external facing address that stroom will register its services with service discovery. If this property is empty stroom will try to establish the hostname. Recommended to be left blank in production to avoid having host specific configuration, unless the hostname is that of a load balancer in front of stroom instances.

property.name: description
property.value: The external facing port that stroom will register its services with service discovery

property.name: description
property.value: Initial time in ms between retries to establish a connection to zookeeper

property.name: description
property.value: Maximum time in ms between retries to establish a connection to zookeeper

property.name: description
property.value: Maximum number of retries to establish a connection to zookeeper before giving up

property.name: description
property.value: The base path to use in zookeeper for Curator service discover. All services registering or querying discoverable services must use the same value for this base path. Must start with a '/'
